name: Vibe Bot
author: Airis
description: A feature-rich Discord bot with 200+ commands, built live on Twitch with the community
repository_notice: Proprietary software. Forking for contributions is allowed. Public redistribution or hosting requires permission.
features: Economy System (25+ commands with trading, stocks, property, crafting)
Leveling & XP (4 commands + voice XP tracking)
Social Features (7 commands: marriage, reputation, profiles)
Mini-Games (25+ games: Hangman, Wordle, Blackjack, Pet System)
Auto-Moderation & Anti-Raid (spam, links, word filters, regex)
Utility Commands (51+ commands with API integrations)
